pkgmetadata.longdescription: Perform Random Experiments // Enables user to perform the following: 1. Roll 'n' number of die/dice (roll()). 2. Toss 'n' number of coin(s) (toss()). 3. Play the game of Rock, Paper, Scissors. 4. Choose 'n' number of card(s) from a pack of 52 playing cards (Joker optional).
